website_summaries.verdict: Bright red Spidey with catchy blue trim. Irresistible for the Spiderman fan.
pros: Available in full and twin sizes
cons: Some owners say the sheets are a bit rough to the touch

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $51
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sheet set for our 5 year old who loves spiderman. After one wash, the softness and quality of material is still fine. Having said that, it’s not worth $51. For $51 the set should include 2 pillowcases, a flat sheet, a fitted sheet, and a comforter. In reality, the set is 1 pillowcase, a fitted sheet, and a comforter. I’ve never boughten a sheet set that didn’t come with a flat sheet or two pillowcases before. It’s a ripe off. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I know some reviewers didn't like the quality or the amount pieces inside the set but I didn't mind. The comforter set was for my 8 year old and he loves it. We usually only use one sheet on our beds for ease of use. So not having the second sheet didn't bother me. It would have been nice if it had some small throw pillows or something but for the price I felt this was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: bold colors, good cotton fabric.
customer_reviews.text: kiddo loooooves his spiderman! sheets look great on the bed and comfy enough that he wants to sleep there, yay! if you're looking for high quality high thread count fabric then this isn't for you. but if you want something your kid can roll around and jump around on that won't rip with the slightest provocation, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mishy177

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a flat sheet only fitted don't buy this set
customer_reviews.text: Very well made my grandson loves it would of gave it 5 stars but I have to buy another set of sheets because it did not come with a flat sheet what bed set don't come with a flat sheet only a fitted had to spend more money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good option for Lower price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a nice set. The comforter however is not very warm. It definitely requires an additional blanket if you want to stay warm. For the super hero brand overall it’s a good deal! Sheets a also decent quality and have not faded with several months of washing
customer_reviews.author: John Sairfo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son LOOOVES it. Really helped get him excited about his new big boy bed. The pillow cases are generously sized and the pillows slip out which is a bummer. The fitted sheet is also generously sized which turned out to be good since we got those bumpers that go under the sheet to keep him from rolling out so ends up fitting perfectly. The Comforter was easy to wash and is really warm. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vesper

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute on my son's bed. He really likes it and I feel like it is light enough for him not to get overheated but to keep him just warm enough. The colors are very vibrant. We were pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nickleberrie

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and my son loves it. I knocked one star off because of quality. It's pretty cheap feeling. The comforter feels sort of plastic-y and not too warm (which actually works to our benefit in San Diego). My son loves it which is the most important part. We'll see how it does during winter (I'll update if it's extremely bad or shockingly sufficient).
customer_reviews.author: ChristerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This set is just perfect! Comfy, cozy warm. Just what we wanted. The colors are just as shown. I wish it came with a top sheet but it seems that many sets do not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: L M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit loud but my grandaughter loves it, so that's what counts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson now makes his bed
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old grandson loves it. He makes his bed to make sure Spiderman can see everything during the day
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping with Spider man a 3year old's dream come true.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I think a top sheet should have been included. My 3 year old grandson, who LOVES spiderman, was thrilled, and will help his transfer to a bigger bed as I purchased the full size.
customer_reviews.author: slwj

customer_reviews.title: I'm only giving 3 stars because there is no top ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving 3 stars because there is no top sheet, which I don't understand why not. First time I seen this. I will purchase a solid color to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No flat sheet in this set
customer_reviews.text: This comforter/sheet set does not come with a flat sheet. I never thought to check that. I have never seen a comforter/sheet set that didn’t come with a flat sheet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Haberstroh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, haven’t opened since it is Birthday gift for my grandson. Will rate further when he opens it
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Got this bedding as a gift for my 3 year old son to encourage him to sleep in his own bed, he likes to cosleep with mom. He’s slept with this set under 10 times and it’s already ripping apart at the seams in multiple places.... pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlin822

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it although the comforter is very flat ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it although the comforter is very flat as you can tell in the picture. I expected a little more fluff especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sthomas

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman
customer_reviews.text: Son was excited To put it on his bed right away after I washed it
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Softt!!
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are very soft, and look nice, vivid colors
customer_reviews.author: natacha casanova

customer_reviews.title: If your thinking about buying it...just buy it...worth it...my 6 year old loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: If your thinking about buying it...just buy it...worth it...my 6 year old loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.c.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Not the softest of sheets, but it has Spiderman and that's all my son cares about.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: I'm on the fence about this item.....
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is very nice and soft. Was not too happy that it didn't come with a flat sheet, but the price was decent. The sheets are no doubt 100% polyester.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Teabo

customer_reviews.title: Great cover good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Spider-Man fan so he loves his cover.
customer_reviews.author: blanca lopez

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our sons room and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Early

customer_reviews.title: No flat sheet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with flat sheet, my mistake. It does say in the description but I missed that and assumed it was the set
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but not worth the money. After 1 wash the pillowcase got a 4” hole in the seam. After 2 washes the stitching on the fitted sheets unraveled so now there is nothing securing the fabric to the elastic band.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Peasley

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves the image of spiderman it has. The.pice was good and were happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We got the wrong size and it’s missing a pillow case. The comforter is very flat also. Not the best. Dear seller I’d like my other pillow case. Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Shaynna A. Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Not bad feel that it’s a tad overpriced tho
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as expected. A sheet a pillow case and a blanket. You are more or less paying for the idea of having Spider-Man on your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This comforter set is very soft and comfortable. But following care instructions for washing and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is very soft and comfortable. But following care instructions for washing and the filling in the comforter is all lumpy now :(
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and soft material. My son looooooves it! Definitely a must-have if your son is a Spiderman lover like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Joa Tav

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this sheet and blanket set it is so soft and it keeps you warm but you won't overheat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Spiderman comforter and sheet.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Spiderman comforter and sheet. I do wish it had come with two sheets but it works
customer_reviews.author: MyLifeNow

customer_reviews.title: Good product; Consider one size larger
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered a queen for my son's full size bed, but it looks great in his room.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fun for Spider-Man fans! I would recommend for toddlers who love this character!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cute product was soft for kids and also easy to wash and dry. Did not shrink or ball up!
customer_reviews.author: Kiara Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Sheets as a gift
customer_reviews.text: For grandson for Christmas and I'm sure he will be marveled.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Smith

customer_reviews.title: I have none.
customer_reviews.text: I mailed this product to my son and grandson so I don't know any of the specifics, but I understand it is loved and is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the softness as he sleeps I recommend to anyone to buy
customer_reviews.author: Salanda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Uncle Ben!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! We had to wash it a couple times to get it soft, but that’s my only issue
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young boy who will change his mind soon.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Easily washable - fits in washer and dryer. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, great delivery, and our son loves them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality stitching
customer_reviews.text: After a couple washes the stitching came undone and the stuffing came out. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Bears

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Not super warm blanket but warm enough. very nice and pretty
customer_reviews.author: AngeKap

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and looked exactly like the picture of the product.
customer_reviews.author: BeLinda Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set. Wishing it would have came with a matching flat sheet. However, my twins were excited and that is really all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this! The comforter is brightly colored and cozy!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The full fitted sheet did not fit it was to small..
customer_reviews.author: Angelli Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: No Issues
customer_reviews.text: I love it 😍 my kids love it as well. They’re room is coming along great. I would recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Chole Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son and i love it very nice thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my grandson . Now we can't get him out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Its cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this. For my 7 year old son he. Loved. it. Its. Light weight basic
customer_reviews.author: sarai arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Its just okay quality,  but it works
customer_reviews.text: I use this set on a spare bedroom in my son's room. The quality is just ok. It looks great with all his spiderman decor, but I don't think it's good enough quality for everyday wear and tear. It feels like it would get worn out quickly. It works for us, since I only really need it for decoration and the occasional sleepover if he has a friend over. Just rating it appropriately for those who may be looking for an every day set for their child.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Son is happy!
customer_reviews.text: My son is so happy with his new blanket set! The inside of it is soft but the sheet, pillowcase and outer side of the blanket are kind of rough. Feels like waterproof fabric but it doesn't bother him. I would give 5 stars if it was softer
customer_reviews.author: Amberly Berdine

customer_reviews.title: Highly Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: the sheets and comforter are very soft, durable, not too thin or thick and looks just like the picture. Bought this for my 3.5 yr old and he now makes his bed every day just so he can see spiderman and because the comforter is just the right size. The package actually arrived 1 day ahead of the estimated earliest delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Buhler

customer_reviews.title: No top sheet!
customer_reviews.text: We just opened the package and my son jumped up and down with delight. I should have read the description and reviews to see that there is no top sheet. I have never heard of nor have I ever seen a comforter “set” come with a fitted sheet and pillow cases, but without the top sheet...so weird! My 3 year old is excited and that’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap -- the pillowcase ripped after 4 days
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday gift for my son. We just used washed and put them on his bed for the first time on Saturday. I looked at them today -- the pillow case was ripping at the seam. I am really upset about this but not as upset as he is -- he couldn't wait to have his spiderman set (we redid his room for his birthday). I am going to attempt to sew myself but will never order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Bussler

customer_reviews.title: spidey would approve
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo daughter wanted this for her bed (she loves Marvel and Spiderman is her favorite) and it's everything she wanted. The blanket is thick but not overly, washes well without falling apart, the colors are vibrant and set looks just like it does in the pictures. She's absolutely thrilled and it's perfect especially for the price (not terribly expensive).
customer_reviews.author: purple cat

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman set is a hit with this 3-year-old boy!
customer_reviews.text: They were a hit with my grandson. But take note - there is no flat top sheet in this set! I should have noticed in the description before ordering, but didn't. And the only matching sheet you can find is a toddler bed size. So I went out and found a blue flat sheet to match the blue in the set. Otherwise, it is great - the best Spiderman design I saw for a little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Z.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved his Spiderman set. I would have liked a top sheet to go with the duvet and fitted bottom sheet. The material is not the best but I suspect his Spiderman interest will wane about the same time as the set. I do not know how durable it is since it's only been washed once.
customer_reviews.author: Book Nut

customer_reviews.title: One compartment contained a nice thick comforter
customer_reviews.text: Well made product, Definately worth buying. I was impressed with the zippered bag the bedding came in, seperated into two zippered compartments. One compartment contained a nice thick comforter, whilst the other contained the fitted sheet and two pillow cases. It was definately worth fifty dollars! And the seller was quick and handled my product with care. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Malinda ODell

customer_reviews.title: Not full size sheet even though that’s what I ordered, just the comforter is full
customer_reviews.text: So, this will teach me to measure. Full size comforter, but TWIN size sheet. Buyer beware. I gave the sheet to my daughter for grandsons twin bed. Ordered a plain blue full size fitted sheet and now his bed st grandmas is good to guy. This is not a full size bed set
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGramma

customer_reviews.title: The material is not great, and a tad to stiff for my liking
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it, and the colors are very vibrant. The material is not great, and a tad to stiff for my liking, but it's warm enough for my son. Everything is easy to wash, and the comforter fits in my washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not big enough
customer_reviews.text: It's really cute with great colors, soft, and easily washable. The only problem is it isn't wide enough for a full. It doesn't come down to the box springs to cover the mattress on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: My poor grandson... he loves it but get so hot! Nothing breaths at all and he loves to curl up in his comforter. He’d wake up soaking wet! (As in sweat! ;) )
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little Spiderman fans!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Washed well and the little guy loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree H.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean , a little stiff but great for your money! My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Josselynn Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: He loved the vibrant colors & was over the top
customer_reviews.text: Quick deliver. He loved the vibrant colors & was over the top. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Since when does a "Comforter SET" not come with a top sheet ? Plus the comforter itself barely covers a full size bed. Cheap....
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Guadagni

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Kids really like it. Wish it had a flat sheet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No flat sheet
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying the description is accurate. However, one must read. I rightly assumed, in my mind, this would come with flat sheet. Nope just fitted, as the description says. Sheet is thin. Regardless of all my grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ever29

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm , durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great grandson. He loves this... so soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Boys
customer_reviews.text: Brought for twins boys, they were excited. Great price for the set
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the comforter. I wish it came with a flat top sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Well two corners of the fitted sheet are torn after only two washes. Guess you get what you pay for, but my son was super stoked about it, nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No top sheet
customer_reviews.text: Grandson very happy with it. Just wish it could have come with matching top sheet.
customer_reviews.author: adknurse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son adores this set and I love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Schneka Alston

product_meta.title: Marvel The Spiderman Webbed Wonder Full Comforter Set with Fitted Sheet
product_meta.description: Marvel The Spiderman Webbed Wonder full bedding comforter set. Comforter set includes 1 comforter, 1 fitted sheet, 2 standard pillowcases; comforter 76-inch by 86-inch, fitted sheet 54-inch by 75-inch+10-inch, standard pillowcases 20-inch by 30-inch; Comforter set fabric content: 100-percent polyester; Washing instructions: machine wash in cold water, tumble dry low;
feature_bullets: Comforter set includes 1 comforter, 1 fitted sheet, 2 standard pillowcases
Comforter 76-inch by 86-inch, fitted sheet 54-inch by 75-inch+10-inch, standard pillowcases 20-inch by 30-inch
Washing instructions: machine wash in cold water, tumble dry low

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars279 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
